Title: Illuminated Tailpiece for Chapter 37 of the Qur'an
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.556 contains an illuminated tailpiece for chapter 37 (Surat al-saffat) that bears an inscription in Early Abbasid (Kufic) script.
Keywords: Arabic; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Headpiece; Illumination; Koran; Manuscript; Ornament; Prayer; Qur`an; Script; Scripture; Maghreb
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: African
